channel.title: Telangana on NewsStreet | News portal
channel.description: Recent content in Telangana on NewsStreet | News portal

item.title: Kothagudem: CI extends financial support to ailing man
item.description: Kothagudem: CI extends financial support to ailing man Yellandu Inspector of Police, Banoth Raju extended financial assistance to an ailing private worker.

item.title: BJP MP Laxman doesn’t see early polls in Telangana
item.description: BJP MP Laxman doesn’t see early polls in Telangana Speaking at a Meet the Press programme at the Press Club at Somajiguda here, Laxman stated that even if the Chief Minister dissolves the state assembly, there is very less possibility of conducting early polls, as the entire decision lies with the Election Commission.

item.title: Traffic diversions in view of Bharath Jodo Yatra in Telangana
item.description: Traffic diversions in view of Bharath Jodo Yatra in Telangana The Cyberabad traffic police in view of the 'Bharath Jodo Yatra' have announced certain traffic diversions for four days starting Sunday.
